name: Our Goddess
description:
"Our Goddess"  is a card game for four players in which three players form a team and play against the remaining one player. Every player plays a "role" as either one of the villagers, or a goddess. Every "role" has its own deck in which only that player will use. Each player will take their turn in order until one team meets their win condition.

https://playingcards.io/jhakwq
